title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Powering AI and agentic platforms with Amazon Bedrock (AIM3305)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Bedrock 驱动 AI 和智能体平台 (AIM3305)
abstract: Organizations are rapidly building AI applications and workflows to automate manual processes and boost productivity. The reality: many of these initiatives never reach production. This session explores the critical challenges of building, deploying, and scaling end-to-end enterprise AI systems and shares proven technical architectures and best practices to go from POC to production with Amazon Bedrock. You'll hear directly from Vercel, a leading provider of AI dev tools, as they share how they built and scaled their production AI platform with Amazon Bedrock and how their AI SDK accelerates building AI applications with Amazon Bedrock integrations.
abstract_cn: 企业正在快速构建AI应用程序和工作流程，以实现手动流程自动化并提高生产力。但现实是：许多此类计划从未投入生产。本次会议探讨了构建、部署和扩展端到端企业AI系统的关键挑战，并分享了经过验证的技术架构和最佳实践，帮助您使用Amazon Bedrock从概念验证阶段过渡到生产环境。您将直接听取Vercel（领先的AI开发工具提供商）的分享，了解他们如何使用Amazon Bedrock构建和扩展其生产AI平台，以及他们的AI SDK如何通过Amazon Bedrock集成加速AI应用程序的构建。

presenter.name: Julia Bodea
presenter.title: Senior Product Manager Technical, Amazon Bedrock

presenter.name: Lowry Snow
presenter.title: Principal, WW GTM, Bedrock and GenAI
